description: Update documentation to reflect the new Openrouter API features.

instructions: Locate the section describing how to use the Openrouter backend.
Add a new subsection or update the existing one to explain how to utilize the new features: system prompt, tools, structured output, cache, and multimodal input (images/PDFs).
Provide clear examples or descriptions of how to pass parameters for these features when using the Openrouter backend.
Review the configuration options for the Openrouter backend.
If any new configuration settings are required or modified for the new features (e.g., cache settings), update `docs/configuration.md` accordingly.
Identify the functions or methods that were modified or added to support the new features (system prompt, tools, structured output, cache, multimodal).

For each identified function/method, add or update the docstring to accurately describe its purpose, parameters (especially the new ones related to the features), return values, and any potential exceptions.
Ensure the docstrings follow standard Python documentation conventions (e.g., using reStructuredText or Google style).
Review the entire `docs/usage.md` and `docs/configuration.md` files to ensure consistency and clarity.
constraints: Only modify the specified documentation files (`docs/usage.md`, `docs/configuration.md`) and add docstrings to `src/ai_whisperer/openrouter_api.py`.
Do not alter the core functionality of the Openrouter API wrapper code itself.
Maintain the existing structure and formatting of the documentation files where possible.
validation_criteria: docs/usage.md is updated with a clear explanation of how to use system prompts with the Openrouter backend.
docs/usage.md is updated with a clear explanation of how to use tools with the Openrouter backend.
docs/usage.md is updated with a clear explanation of how to use structured output with the Openrouter backend.
docs/usage.md is updated with a clear explanation of how to use cache with the Openrouter backend.
docs/usage.md is updated with a clear explanation of how to provide multimodal input (images/PDFs) with the Openrouter backend.
docs/configuration.md is updated if any relevant configuration changes were necessary for the new features.
All functions/methods in `src/ai_whisperer/openrouter_api.py` that were modified or added for the new features have updated or new docstrings.
The docstrings accurately describe the parameters and behavior related to the new features.
